title: Purge
description: Purge wants revenge. And will destroy everything in their path to get it. My city is in their path.I'm in way over my head. Purge is a potpourri of destructive forces that can level city blocks with primal energies that defy scientific understanding of the Universe.My thing is somersaults, kicking stuff, and occasionally I’ll do a flip…And with all due respect to the most powerful villains on the planet, Purge still needs to take a number. My father’s headed to prison. A zombie apocalypse is imminent. And now a mind-reading sociopath has my identity… and plans to use it against me.But it’s still all fun and games until my mother gets abducted. Now I have to find who took her, and stop them from killing her. All before the entire city is dragged halfway to hell…Could be worse.
author: Arthur Mayor
